casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. Michael RAVY
v.
STATE of Louisiana NO. 2017-KH-1539 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 14, 2018 Denied. Relator has previously exhausted his right to state collateral review. See State ex rel. Ravy v. State, 15-1682 (La. 10/10/16), 201 So.3d 882 . WEIMER, J., recused.
